title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
Meet the Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles—your daily shortcut to smoother, healthier-looking skin. Designed for comfort, reach, and results, this dual-sided back scrubber turns every shower into a mini spa treatment.

Why you’ll love it:
- Two sides, total care: Soft nylon bristles gently cleanse and pamper sensitive skin, while natural stiff bristles exfoliate to remove dead skin, boost circulation, and leave you feeling refreshed.
- Wet or dry versatility: Use in the shower for a deep, sudsy clean or try dry brushing before bathing to invigorate skin and support a healthy glow.
- Easy reach, secure grip: The 17-inch wooden handle makes back and body care effortless. A non-slip rubber patch ensures a steady hold, and the hanging rope lets it dry quickly and store neatly.
- Thoughtful durability: Quality materials designed for daily use. For best hygiene, wash the brush every few weeks and replace every 3–6 months.

What’s included: 1 dual-sided Metene shower brush.

Smooth, exfoliated, and revitalized—your best skin starts in the shower. Add the Metene Shower Brush to your routine and feel the difference from the very first use.
